metadata.title: CVE-2022-37047 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The component tcprewrite in Tcpreplay v4.4.1 was discovered to contain aheap-based buffer overflow in get_ipv6_next at common/get.c:713. NOTE: thisis different from CVE-2022-27940.

criterions.comment: tcpreplay: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
